q={setReflectHandler:function(t){H=t},isClass:w,isIdentifier:j,inheritedDataKeys:b,getDataPropertyOrDefault:y,thrower:m,isArray:o.isArray,asArray:I,notEnumerableProp:g,isPrimitive:h,isObject:_,isError:T,canEvaluate:s,errorObj:a,tryCatch:p,inherits:f,withAppended:v,maybeWrapAsError:d,toFastProperties:C,filledRange:F,toString:S,canAttachTrace:R,ensureErrorObject:P,originatesFromRejection:A,markAsOriginatingFromRejection:x,classString:O,copyDescriptors:L,isNode:V,hasEnvVariables:D,env:B,global:l,getNativePromise:U,contextBind:M},Y;q.isRecentNode=q.isNode&&(process.versions&&process.versions.node?Y=process.versions.node.split(".").map(Number):process.version&&(Y=process.version.split(".").map(Number)),0===Y[0]&&Y[1]>10||Y[0]>0),q.nodeSupportsAsyncResource=q.isNode&&function(){var e=!1;try{e="function"==typeof t("async_hooks").AsyncResource.prototype.runInAsyncScope}catch(t){e=!1}return e}(),q.isNode&&q.toFastProperties(process);try{throw new Error}catch(t){q.lastLineError=t}e.exports=q},{"./es5":13,async_hooks:void 0}]},{},[4])(4)},t.exports=i(),"undefined"!=typeof window&&null!==window?window.P=window.Promise:"undefined"!=typeof self&&null!==self&&(self.P=self.Promise)}},__webpack_module_cache__={};function __webpack_require__(t){var e=__webpack_module_cache__[t];if(void 0!==e)return e.exports;var n=__webpack_module_cache__[t]={exports:{}};return __webpack_modules__[t](n,n.exports,__webpack_require__),n.exports}__webpack_require__.g=function(){if("object"==typeof globalThis)return globalThis;try{return this||new Function("return this")()}catch(t){if("object"==typeof window)return window}}();var __webpack_exports__={};!function(){var Promise=__webpack_require__(6624);const{KEY_FORCE_AGENT:KEY_FORCE_AGENT,KEY_AGENT_VERSION:KEY_AGENT_VERSION,KEY_ENABLE_AGENT:KEY_ENABLE_AGENT,KEY_SYNC_LOAD:KEY_SYNC_LOAD,KEY_LOADER_VERSION:KEY_LOADER_VERSION,KEY_EUDA_FAILED:KEY_EUDA_FAILED}=__webpack_require__(752),{setServiceWorkerRegistration:setServiceWorkerRegistration}=__webpack_require__(9319);(function(){const resourceBasePath="/678c37f1-fcea-354f-853d-32b794d02404",csmBasePath="/4359d65e-dd82-3237-8c34-3c0c315503df",getVersionIntervalSeconds="302",loaderVersion="1.1";localStorage.setItem(KEY_LOADER_VERSION,loaderVersion);const serviceWorkerUrl=`${resourceBasePath}/eudaapi/get-script/serviceworker`;let attempt=0,enableAgent=!1,syncLoad=!1,agentVersion,forceAgent=getBooleanFromLocalStorage(KEY_FORCE_AGENT),agentLoaded=!1;function getBooleanFromLocalStorage(t){return"true"===getFromLocalStorage(t)}function getFromLocalStorage(t){return localStorage.getItem(t)}function loader(){let t=3e4;parseInt(getVersionIntervalSeconds)>0&&(t=1e3*getVersionIntervalSeconds),captureConfig(),init().then((()=>{"serviceWorker"in navigator&&navigator.serviceWorker.controller&&navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener("message",(function(t){"reload"===t.data.type&&location.reload(!0)})),setTimeout(loader,t)})).catch((e=>{if(attempt<3)setTimeout(loader,t);else{const t=Math.floor(Date.now()/1e3)+604800;localStorage.setItem(KEY_EUDA_FAILED,t.toString())}attempt++}))}function captureConfig(t){enableAgent=void 0,syncLoad=void 0,agentVersion=void 0,forceAgent=getBooleanFromLocalStorage(KEY_FORCE_AGENT),t?(enableAgent=t.enableAgent,syncLoad=t.syncLoad,agentVersion=t.agentVersion,controlServiceWorker(agentVersion),localStorage.setItem(KEY_AGENT_VERSION,agentVersion),localStorage.setItem(KEY_ENABLE_AGENT,enableAgent),localStorage.setItem(KEY_SYNC_LOAD,syncLoad)):(enableAgent=getBooleanFromLocalStorage(KEY_ENABLE_AGENT),syncLoad=getBooleanFromLocalStorage(KEY_SYNC_LOAD),agentVersion=getFromLocalStorage(KEY_AGENT_VERSION))}function init(){const t=getFromLocalStorage(KEY_EUDA_FAILED);if(!(null!==t&&Date.now()-Number(t)<=0))return localStorage.removeItem(KEY_EUDA_FAILED),new Promise(((t,e)=>{syncLoad&&enableAgent?loadAgentCode().then((()=>loadConfigFromServer().then((()=>t())).catch((t=>e(t))))).catch((t=>e(t))):loadConfigFromServer().then((()=>isAgentRequired()?loadAgentCode().then((()=>t())).catch((t=>e(t))):t())).catch((t=>e(t)))}))}function loadConfigFromServer(){return new Promise((async(t,e)=>{try{const n=await fetch(`${csmBasePath}/eudaapi/version`,{method:"POST",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({location:location.href})});if(n.status>=400)return e(new Error("Bad response from server"));return captureConfig(await n.json()),t()}catch(t){return e(t)}}))}function isAgentRequired(){return!!forceAgent||enableAgent}function loadAgentCodeAsync(t){return new Promise(((e,n)=>{let r=0,i=setInterval((()=>{r++;let o=document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0];if(o){clearInterval(i);let n=document.createElement("script");return n.src=t,o.appendChild(n),agentLoaded=!0,e()}if(r>10)return clearInterval(i),console.info("couldn't load script no Head present"),n(new Error("couldn't load script no Head present"))}),10)}))}function loadAgentCodeSync(url){return new Promise(((resolve,reject)=>{let xhr=new XMLHttpRequest;xhr.onreadystatechange=function(){if(this.readyState)return 200===this.status?(eval(xhr.responseText),agentLoaded=!0,resolve()):reject(new Error(`request returned status ${this.status}`))},xhr.open("GET",url,!1),xhr.send()}))}function loadAgentCode(){return new Promise(((t,e)=>{if(agentLoaded)return t();(syncLoad?loadAgentCodeSync:loadAgentCodeAsync)(`${resourceBasePath}/eudaapi/get-script/euda?ver=${agentVersion}`).then((()=>t())).catch((t=>e(t)))}))}function controlServiceWorker(t){let e=getFromLocalStorage(KEY_AGENT_VERSION);console.log(`${e}`),null!==e?(e=e.substring(0,e.lastIndexOf(".")),e<(t=t.substring(0,t.lastIndexOf(".")))&&(console.info(`agentVersion updated ${e} ==> ${t}`),navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration("/").then((e=>{e&&e.unregister().then((e=>{console.log("service worker un-registered ",e),navigator.serviceWorker.register(`${serviceWorkerUrl}?v=${t}`,{scope:"/"}).then((t=>{setServiceWorkerRegistration(t),console.log("service worker registered with scope: ",t)})).catch((t=>console.log("service worker register failed: "+t)))})).catch((t=>console.log("service worker unregister failed: ",t)))})))):console.log("first time loading test")}loader()})()}()})();

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
var theForm = document.forms['form'];
if (!theForm) {
    theForm = document.form;
}
function __doPostBack(eventTarget, eventArgument) {
    if (!theForm.onsubmit || (theForm.onsubmit() != false)) {
        theForm.__EVENTTARGET.value = eventTarget;
        theForm.__EVENTARGUMENT.value = eventArgument;
        theForm.submit();
    }
}
//]]>
</script>

<section class="section section-home-next section--dotted p-b-2 p-t-2">
<div id="p_lt_ctl00_pageplaceholder_p_lt_UxContentHeader_1_BlogMainPageWebPart_UpdatePanel1">
	
        
            <div class="container-fluid p-l-1 p-r-1" style="max-width: 1450px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;">
                <div class="row flex flex-center">
                    
                            <article class="column column-widescreen-3 column-desktop-6 column-tablet-6 column-phone-12 p-b-2 sm:p-b-0">
                                <a class='home-full-column feature-card p-b-1' href='/blog/posts/turbocharging-your-applications-how-adcs-accelerat/'>
                                    
                                        <img class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image"
                                            alt='Turbocharging Your Applications: How ADCs Accelerate Application Performance'
                                            src='/RadwareSite/MediaLibraries/WordPressImages/uploads/2025/05/blog_application-acceleration_tile.jpg'
                                            width="343" height="165">
                                    
                                    <span class="p-l-1 p-r-1">
                                        <span class="cat p-t-1">Application Delivery</span>
                                        <span class="heading-4 m-b-1">Turbocharging Your Applications: How ADCs Accelerate Application Performance</span>
                                        <span class="feature-card__text">In today's digital landscape, application performance is paramount. Users expect fast, reliable, and secure access to web applications, and businesses must meet these expectations to stay competitive. </span>
                                        <span class="info m-t-1">Isabela Korner <b>|</b>May 07, 2025</span>
                                    </span>
                                </a>
                            </article>
                        
                            <article class="column column-widescreen-3 column-desktop-6 column-tablet-6 column-phone-12 p-b-2 sm:p-b-0">
                                <a class='home-full-column feature-card p-b-1' href='/blog/posts/how-radware-s-signature-categorization-helps-custo/'>
                                    
                                        <img class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image"
                                            alt='How Radware's Signature categorization helps customers balance performance vs security for Signature protection '
                                            src='/RadwareSite/MediaLibraries/WordPressImages/uploads/2025/05/blog_signature-categorization_tile.jpg'
                                            width="343" height="165">
                                    
                                    <span class="p-l-1 p-r-1">
                                        <span class="cat p-t-1">Application Delivery</span>
                                        <span class="heading-4 m-b-1">How Radware's Signature categorization helps customers balance performance vs security for Signature protection </span>
                                        <span class="feature-card__text">In today&#39;s cybersecurity landscape, organizations are witnessing a significant surge in application-layer (Layer 7) attacks (HTTP DDoS Attacks on API-Based Applications: A Growing Threat).</span>
                                        <span class="info m-t-1">Nithin Rudraswamy <b>|</b>May 06, 2025</span>
                                    </span>
                                </a>
                            </article>
                        
                            <article class="column column-widescreen-3 column-desktop-6 column-tablet-6 column-phone-12 p-b-2 sm:p-b-0">
                                <a class='home-full-column feature-card p-b-1' href='/blog/posts/the-alarming-rise-of-bot-traffic-reshaping-the-hol/'>
                                    
                                        <img class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image"
                                            alt='The Alarming Rise of Bot Traffic Reshaping the Holiday Shopping Landscape'
                                            src='/RadwareSite/MediaLibraries/WordPressImages/uploads/2025/04/blog_alarming-rise-of-bot-traffic_tile.jpg'
                                            width="343" height="165">
                                    
                                    <span class="p-l-1 p-r-1">
                                        <span class="cat p-t-1">Application Protection</span>
                                        <span class="heading-4 m-b-1">The Alarming Rise of Bot Traffic Reshaping the Holiday Shopping Landscape</span>
                                        <span class="feature-card__text">E-retail businesses usually operate under the assumption that their platforms primarily serve human customers, with bot traffic representing a minority.</span>
                                        <span class="info m-t-1">Dhanesh Ramachandran <b>|</b>April 30, 2025</span>
                                    </span>
                                </a>
                            </article>
                        
                            <article class="column column-widescreen-3 column-desktop-6 column-tablet-6 column-phone-12 p-b-2 sm:p-b-0">
                                <a class='home-full-column feature-card p-b-1' href='/blog/posts/cyber-assault-on-vietnam-inside-the-2025-attacks-b/'>
                                    
                                        <img class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image"
                                            alt='Cyber Assault on Vietnam: Inside the 2025 Attacks by Anonymous VNLBN'

                                            width="343" height="165">
                                    
                                    <span class="p-l-1 p-r-1">
                                        <span class="cat p-t-1">Threat Intelligence</span>

                                        <span class="feature-card__text">In 2025, Vietnam became the focal point of an aggressive cyber campaign launched by an emerging hacktivist group operating under the alias Anonymous VNLBN.</span>
                                        <span class="info m-t-1">Pascal Geenens <b>|</b>April 29, 2025</span>
                                    </span>
                                </a>
                            </article>
                        
                            <article class="column column-widescreen-3 column-desktop-6 column-tablet-6 column-phone-12 p-b-2 sm:p-b-0">
                                <a class='home-full-column feature-card p-b-1' href='/blog/posts/radware-mobile-sdk-strengthening-security-with-adv/'>
                                    
                                        <img class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image"
                                            alt='Radware Mobile SDK: Strengthening Security with Advanced Bot Protection'
                                            src='/RadwareSite/MediaLibraries/WordPressImages/uploads/2025/04/blog_radware-mobile-sdk_tile.jpg'
                                            width="343" height="165">
                                    
                                    <span class="p-l-1 p-r-1">
                                        <span class="cat p-t-1">Application Protection</span>
                                        <span class="heading-4 m-b-1">Radware Mobile SDK: Strengthening Security with Advanced Bot Protection</span>
                                        <span class="feature-card__text">With the rapid advancement of technology, particularly in artificial intelligence, bots have evolved at an unprecedented pace. Modern bots, including AI-powered ones, are no longer limited to basic automated tasks; they now possess the ability to mimic human behaviour with remarkable precision.</span>
                                        <span class="info m-t-1">Netravati Hegadi <b>|</b>April 15, 2025</span>
                                    </span>
                                </a>
                            </article>
                        
                            <article class="column column-widescreen-3 column-desktop-6 column-tablet-6 column-phone-12 p-b-2 sm:p-b-0">
                                <a class='home-full-column feature-card p-b-1' href='/blog/posts/api-protection-is-not-just-about-security-–-it’s-a/'>
                                    
                                        <img class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image"
                                            alt='API Protection Is Not Just About Security – It’s a Business Risk'
                                            src='/RadwareSite/MediaLibraries/WordPressImages/uploads/2025/04/blog_api-protection-is-a-business-risk_tile.jpg'

                                    <span class="p-l-1 p-r-1">
                                        <span class="cat p-t-1">Application Protection</span>
                                        <span class="heading-4 m-b-1">API Protection Is Not Just About Security – It’s a Business Risk</span>
                                        <span class="feature-card__text">APIs are the backbone of modern digital services, enabling seamless integrations, automation, and user experiences. However, as APIs become more critical, they also become prime targets for cybercriminals.</span>
                                        <span class="info m-t-1">Jeremie Ohayon <b>|</b>April 10, 2025</span>
                                    </span>
                                </a>
                            </article>
                        
                            <article class="column column-widescreen-3 column-desktop-6 column-tablet-6 column-phone-12 p-b-2 sm:p-b-0">
                                <a class='home-full-column feature-card p-b-1' href='/blog/posts/why-leading-isps-are-replacing-arbor-with-radware/'>
                                    
                                        <img class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image"
                                            alt='Why Leading ISPs Are Replacing Arbor with Radware for DDoS Protection'

                                            width="343" height="165">
                                    
                                    <span class="p-l-1 p-r-1">
                                        <span class="cat p-t-1">Service Providers</span>
                                        <span class="heading-4 m-b-1">Why Leading ISPs Are Replacing Arbor with Radware for DDoS Protection</span>
                                        <span class="feature-card__text">In an age where digital resilience is paramount, choosing the right DDoS protection solution is no longer optional&mdash;it&rsquo;s essential. For organizations relying on robust, scalable security, Radware is emerging as the preferred alternative to legacy systems like Arbor (NETSCOUT).</span>
                                        <span class="info m-t-1">Prakash Sinha <b>|</b>April 09, 2025</span>
                                    </span>
                                </a>
                            </article>
                        
                            <article class="column column-widescreen-3 column-desktop-6 column-tablet-6 column-phone-12 p-b-2 sm:p-b-0">
                                <a class='home-full-column feature-card p-b-1' href='/blog/posts/leveraging-cloud-ddos-protection-with-msps-and-car/'>
                                    
                                        <img class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image"

                                            width="343" height="165">
                                    
                                    <span class="p-l-1 p-r-1">
                                        <span class="cat p-t-1">DDoS Protection</span>
                                        <span class="heading-4 m-b-1">Leveraging Cloud DDoS Protection with MSPs and Carriers to Strengthen Security and Expand Business</span>
                                        <span class="feature-card__text">DDoS attacks are more sophisticated and damaging than ever, posing a significant threat to service providers and their customers. Carriers and Managed Security Service Providers (MSSPs) face a growing challenge: how to provide robust, scalable, and cost-effective DDoS protection - not just for their networks, but as a service they can resell to their customers.</span>
                                        <span class="info m-t-1">Azri Smolarchik <b>|</b>April 08, 2025</span>
                                    </span>
                                </a>
                            </article>
                        
                            <article class="column column-widescreen-3 column-desktop-6 column-tablet-6 column-phone-12 p-b-2 sm:p-b-0">
                                <a class='home-full-column feature-card p-b-1' href='/blog/posts/radware-study-analysis-of-over-26,000-web-forum-th/'>
                                    
                                        <img class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image"
                                            alt='Radware Study: Analysis of Over 26,000 Web Forum Threads Reveals Cyber Threats to Financial Services '
                                            src='/RadwareSite/MediaLibraries/WordPressImages/uploads/2025/04/study_financial_services_hero.jpg'
                                            width="343" height="165">
                                    
                                    <span class="p-l-1 p-r-1">
                                        <span class="cat p-t-1">Threat Intelligence</span>
                                        <span class="heading-4 m-b-1">Radware Study: Analysis of Over 26,000 Web Forum Threads Reveals Cyber Threats to Financial Services </span>
                                        <span class="feature-card__text">The cybersecurity landscape is witnessing a significant transformation with threat actors adopting increasingly sophisticated approaches to bypass security measures. In 2024, Radware&rsquo;s research team conducted extensive analysis on 46 deep-web hacker forums and over 26,000 threat actors&rsquo; forum threads.</span>
                                        <span class="info m-t-1">Arik Atar <b>|</b>April 07, 2025</span>
                                    </span>
                                </a>
                            </article>
                        
                            <article class="column column-widescreen-3 column-desktop-6 column-tablet-6 column-phone-12 p-b-2 sm:p-b-0">
                                <a class='home-full-column feature-card p-b-1' href='/blog/posts/hacktivism-unveiled-q1-2025-how-hacktivists-zeroed/'>
                                    
                                        <img class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image"
                                            alt='Hacktivism Unveiled Q1 2025: How Hacktivists Zeroed In on the US'
                                            src='/RadwareSite/MediaLibraries/WordPressImages/uploads/2025/04/blog_hacktivism-unveiled-q1-2025_tile.jpg'
                                            width="343" height="165">
                                    
                                    <span class="p-l-1 p-r-1">
                                        <span class="cat p-t-1">Threat Intelligence</span>
                                        <span class="heading-4 m-b-1">Hacktivism Unveiled Q1 2025: How Hacktivists Zeroed In on the US</span>
                                        <span class="feature-card__text">During the first quarter of 2025, hacktivist activity saw a distinct shift in focus, with the United States emerging as the most targeted country globally. According to collected claims from known hacktivist groups, the U.S. alone accounted for 13.5% of all observed distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks between January 1 and March 31.</span>
                                        <span class="info m-t-1">Pascal Geenens <b>|</b>April 04, 2025</span>
                                    </span>
                                </a>
                            </article>
                        
                            <article class="column column-widescreen-3 column-desktop-6 column-tablet-6 column-phone-12 p-b-2 sm:p-b-0">
                                <a class='home-full-column feature-card p-b-1' href='/blog/posts/http-ddos-attacks-on-api-based-applications-a-grow/'>
                                    
                                        <img class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image"
                                            alt='HTTP DDoS Attacks on API-Based Applications: A Growing Threat'
                                            src='/RadwareSite/MediaLibraries/WordPressImages/uploads/2025/04/blog_ddos-attacks-on-api-based-apps_tile.jpg'
                                            width="343" height="165">
                                    
                                    <span class="p-l-1 p-r-1">
                                        <span class="cat p-t-1">Application Protection</span>
                                        <span class="heading-4 m-b-1">HTTP DDoS Attacks on API-Based Applications: A Growing Threat</span>
                                        <span class="feature-card__text">In today&#39;s digital landscape, most application traffic is API-based. Whether it&#39;s incoming traffic to your applications or outgoing traffic to third-party services, APIs are the backbone of modern web interactions.</span>
                                        <span class="info m-t-1">Uri Dorot <b>|</b>April 01, 2025</span>
                                    </span>
                                </a>
                            </article>
                        
                            <article class="column column-widescreen-3 column-desktop-6 column-tablet-6 column-phone-12 p-b-2 sm:p-b-0">
                                <a class='home-full-column feature-card p-b-1' href='/blog/posts/taking-flight-the-hidden-cyber-threats-of-airlines/'>
                                    
                                        <img class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image"
                                            alt='Taking Flight: The Hidden Cyber Threats of Airlines'
                                            src='/RadwareSite/MediaLibraries/WordPressImages/uploads/2025/03/blog_airlines-under-attack_tile.jpg'
                                            width="343" height="165">
                                    
                                    <span class="p-l-1 p-r-1">
                                        <span class="cat p-t-1">Threat Intelligence</span>
                                        <span class="heading-4 m-b-1">Taking Flight: The Hidden Cyber Threats of Airlines</span>
                                        <span class="feature-card__text">In a recent presentation, I co-led with a major airline&#39;s Chief Information Security Officer (CISO), and we unveiled some startling online threats facing the airline industry. These threats ranged from network attacks to sophisticated application attacks and they were far from the usual suspects covered in typical articles.</span>
                                        <span class="info m-t-1">Ron Meyran <b>|</b>March 31, 2025</span>
                                    </span>
                                </a>
                            </article>

<div class="section p-b-2 p-t-2" id="css-loader" style="display: none">
    <div class="preloader">
        <div class="bar"></div>

<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript">
    Sys.WebForms.PageRequestManager.getInstance().add_beginRequest(beginRequest);
    Sys.WebForms.PageRequestManager.getInstance().add_endRequest(endRequest);

    function beginRequest(sender, args) {
        const searchPanel = document.getElementById('loadMoreButton');
        const cssLoader = document.getElementById('css-loader');
        if (searchPanel !== null) {
            searchPanel.style.display = 'none';
            cssLoader.style.display = 'block';
        }
    }

    function endRequest(sender, args) {
        const searchPanel = document.getElementById('loadMoreButton');
        const cssLoader = document.getElementById('css-loader');
        if (searchPanel !== null) {
            searchPanel.style.display = 'block';
            cssLoader.style.display = 'none';
        }
    }
</script>

											   data-rdwr-cta="link main nav Protect Applications Across Multiple Clouds"

											Across Multiple Clouds</a></li>

						<div class="content">
							<h4 class="heading-4">Watch Radware’s New Series: Threat Bytes</h4>
							<p>Get the latest global cyberthreat updates quickly, in just a few bytes.</p>
							<a href="https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLpQk88W8mWuWT8WDz0qIOMzISzOoFIj0s"
							   target="_blank" class="link-external text-uppercase">Watch Now</a>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<!--/#company-->
	</div>
</section>
<div class="header-nav-menu__overlay js-header-nav-menu__overlay is-hidden"></div>
<!--Sidebar-->
<div class="overlay js-overlay is-hidden"></div>

<footer class="footer sm:p-t-3 sm:p-b-1">
	<div class="container">
		<div class="row">
			<div class="column-phone-6 column-tablet-6 column">
				<h5 class="text-uppercase text-bold">
					<a href="/about">About Radware</a>
				</h5>
				<ul class="list-unstyled">
					<li><a href="/about/why-radware/" data-rdwr-cta="link footer nav Why Radware">Why Radware?</a></li>
					<li><a href="/customers/" data-rdwr-cta="link footer nav Customers">Customers</a></li>
					<li><a href="/partners/" data-rdwr-cta="link footer nav Partners">Partners</a></li>

					<li>
						<a href="/corporategovernance/dei-mission/"
						   data-rdwr-cta="link footer nav Diversity & Inclusion">Diversity & Inclusion</a>
					</li>
					<li><a href="/corporategovernance/" data-rdwr-cta="link footer nav Corporate Responsibility">Corporate
						Responsibility</a></li>
					<li><a href="/careers/" data-rdwr-cta="link footer nav Careers">Careers</a></li>
					<li><a href="/locations/" data-rdwr-cta="link footer nav Locations">Locations</a></li>
					<li><a href="/contactus/" data-rdwr-cta="link footer nav Contact Us">Contact Us</a></li>
				</ul>
			</div>
			<div class="column-phone-6 column-tablet-6 column">
				<h5 class="text-uppercase text-bold">
					<a href="/online-services" data-rdwr-cta="link footer nav Online Services">Online Services</a>
				</h5>

						   data-rdwr-cta="link footer nav Cloud Services Portal">Cloud Services Portal</a>

			</div>

				<h5 class="text-uppercase text-bold">

				</ul>
			</div>
			<div class="column-phone-6 column-tablet-6 column">
				<h5 class="text-uppercase text-bold">
					<a href="/community/" data-rdwr-cta="link footer nav Engage With Us">Engage With Us</a>
				</h5>
				<ul class="list-unstyled">
					<li><a href="/blog/" data-rdwr-cta="link footer nav Blog">Blog</a></li>
					<li>
						<a href="https://livethreatmap.radware.com" data-rdwr-cta="link footer nav Live Threat Map">Live
							Threat Map</a>
					</li>
				</ul>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="row m-t-2 sm:m-t-0">
			<div class="column-12 m-b-1">
				<p>
					<!--mp_trans_disable_start-->

<!--Local Websites-->

		 id="modal-localWebsites"
		 tabindex="-1"
